scripts.build: npm --prefix packages/frontend run build && npm --prefix packages/backend run build
scripts.lint: npm --prefix packages/frontend run lint && npm --prefix packages/backend run lint
scripts.test: npm --prefix packages/proto test && npm --prefix packages/frontend test && npm --prefix packages/backend test
scripts.proto: cp -R proto/* packages/backend/proto && cp -R proto/* packages/frontend/proto
scripts.test:int: npm run redis-test:start && npm run redis-test:stop
scripts.test:int:circleci: npm run redis-test:start:circleci && npm run redis-test:stop:circleci
scripts.redis-test:start: npm run redis-test:stop && docker-compose -f docker-compose-testing.yml up --abort-on-container-exit
scripts.redis-test:start:circleci: npm run redis-test:stop && docker-compose -f docker-compose-testing-circleci.yml up --abort-on-container-exit

hooks.pre-commit: lerna run --concurrency 1 --stream precommit && npm run test && npm run test:int
